author: Ben Travis
title: Oscars viewers freaked out by Nicole Kidman‚Äôs bizarre clapping | London Evening Standard
text:
Oscars viewers freaked out by Nicole Kidman‚Äôs bizarre clapping 
The actress was compared to The Grinch for her strange clap technique Monday 27 February 2017 07:46 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Bizarre: Oscars viewers were very confused by Nicole Kidman's clapping ABC 
Viewers who stayed up to watch The Oscars were left decidedly confused by one question ‚Äì and it wasn‚Äôt who actually won Best Picture. 
No, debate raged across Twitter on one important topic: does Nicole Kidman know how to clap? 
The Australian actress, who starred in nominated film Lion, was filmed making some bizarre hand movements during the ceremony. 
Kidman‚Äôs clapping technique appeared to involve using just her palms ‚Äì and it made for some strange viewing. Academy Awards 2017 Oscars Winners - In pictures Academy Awards 2017 Oscars Winners - In pictures 1/19 
Emma Stone poses with her Oscar for Best Actress for her role in "La La Land" Lucas Jackson/Reuters 2/19 
Mahershala Ali, for Moonlight and Best Actress Emma Stone for La La Land, hold their Oscars Lucas Jackson/Reuters 3/19

irector Barry Jenkins holds the Oscar as Moonlight wins Best Picture Lucy Nicholson/Reuters 7/19

One viewer compared her hands to Dr Seuss‚Äôs character The Grinch, while another said she had ‚Äò#sealhands‚Äô. Why does Nicole Kidman clap like The Grinch?! pic.twitter.com/dhzN7Og8xC ‚Äî Michael Lopriore (@MichaelLopriore) February 27, 2017 Nicole Kidman ain't got a clue how to clap üòê wtf #sealHands #oscars pic.twitter.com/yuh6Zb2ejq
